tutorials.title: Getting Started with Oracle Big Data Service
Preparing for Big Data Service
tutorials.description: Prerequisite steps required for Big Data Service deployments.

tutorials.title: Create a BDS Hadoop Cluster
tutorials.description: Use the BDS console to create a highly available and secure hadoop cluster.

tutorials.title: Create a Hadoop Admin User
tutorials.description: Create a Hadoop admin user that will be used for the BDS.  This Hadoop superuser will have access to all data on the cluster an all Hive metadata.

tutorials.title: Access a BDS Utility Node Using a Public IP
tutorials.description: Create a public IP address and assign it to a BDS Utility Node

tutorials.title: Create an Edge Node for Your Cluster
tutorials.description: Access your cluster and run jobs from the Edge Node

tutorials.title: Backup Hadoop Cluster to Object Storage
tutorials.description: Backup HDFS data and Hive metadata to Oracle Object Storage

tutorials.title: Restore Hadoop Cluster from Object Store
tutorials.description: Restore HDFS data and Hive metadata from Oracle Object Storage

tutorials.title: Get Started with Cloud SQL
tutorials.description: Add Cloud SQL to your cluster and query Hadoop using Oracle SQL

tutorials.title: Migrating to Big Data Service
tutorials.description: Migrating to Big Data Service.  Why?  How?
